name: Aitako Consulting
tag_list: gis, software, innovation, design, marketing, development, location-based-social-media, social-media, facebook, twitter
overview:
Aitako is an innovative software design, development and consulting company based in Johannesburg, South Africa.

They specialise in location aware application and website development, and marketing using online services such as Twitter and Facebook. They are involved in a community based charity project named Cyclebuds.com, and are always interested in developing cool new applications using the best technologies available for the job.

They pride themselves in being a creative problem solving force, and in thinking outside of the box to find solutions best suited to the challenge at hand.
